title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy statement explains the personal data our company collects, how we process it, and for what purposes.

dataUsage.purpose: To provide and maintain our service
dataUsage.details: We use your information to deliver the services you have requested, including processing transactions and sending updates.
We may use feedback you provide to improve our products and services.
We may use your information to contact you regarding your account, orders, and other requests, as well as to send promotional materials.
We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations, such as responding to subpoenas or legal processes.

dataSharing.purpose: We share your data with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.

dataSecurity.description: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to secure your personal data and protect it against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

yourRights: Object to processing of your data
